text: Sommerau is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Bas-Rhin department in northeast France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Allenwiller (the seat), Birkenwald, Salenthal and Singrist.Arrêté préfectoral 8 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Bas-Rhin
title: Sommerau, Bas-Rhin
